data.name: B.S. in Computer Science (Games)
data.details:
Viterbi School of Engineering
W.V.T. Rusch Undergraduate Honors Program

data.name: Technical Associate
data.details:
Designed and programmed a visual and functional upgrade to an internal dashboard tool. Built new functionality onto existing Java Web Applications.
Worked with: Java, PHP, SQL, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and React

data.name: Undergraduate Researcher
data.details:
Automated the creation and initialization of virtual containers and switches to facilitate the creation of large scale virtual networks.
Worked with: Chef, Vagrant, OpenvSwitch, Ruby, and Bash

data.name: Undergraduate Researcher
data.details:
Created an Internet of Things middleware to draw meaningful conclusions from sensor data. Presented results at the 2014 CollaborateCom CollabCloud Workshop.
Worked with: Firebase, Phidget Sensors, and Java

data.name: QA Lead and Engineer
data.details:
A local multiplayer PS4 stealth-fighting game utilizing a dichromatic scheme. Implemented gameplay logic, developed test suites, managed a ten person QA team, and found and fixed numerous bugs
Worked with: Unity, PS4 DevKits/TestKits, Slack, Trello, and Perforce

data.name: Engineer and Designer
data.details:
A local multiplayer PC cooperative game about a not-quite big enough sidewalk. Designed and programmed gameplay logic, player feedback, and controller support
Worked with: Unity

data.name: Network Engineer
data.details:
A game engine built in C++. Programmed server authoritative multiplayer using UDP socket programming and client-side prediction
Worked with: C++, Lua

data.name: Designer, 3-D Modeler, Engineer
data.details:
A single player procedurally generated dungeon crawler through the human body. Designed and programmed gameplay logic and systems, created 3-D models, and created and programmed UI elements
Worked with: C#, MonoDevelop, XNA, and GIMP

data.name: Programming Languages
data.subname: C++, C#, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, Python, Ruby, Lua, Shell scripting

data.name: Software
data.subname: Eclipse, Visual Studio, MS Office, Photoshop, GIMP, Maya, Unity, Slack, Trello

data.name: Version Control and Other
data.subname: Git, Perforce, SVN, React, Chef, Spring

data.name: Dean's List - USC
data.subname: 3.5 GPA or higher - awarded every semester from Fall 2012 - Spring 2016

data.name: Tau Beta Pi - California Delta Chapter - USC
